name: Activate Media
description:
Founded in 1992, Activate Media is a London based digital design and development agency with years of experience of making the web work for our clients through innovative solutions and services. 
With a team of highly experienced team of designers, programmers, analysts and marketers; we invent ideas and produce web based systems that take organisations to the next level. 
Our unique work methodology is the key to our success and what separates us from the rest. We have a proven method and approach built on working very closely together.  Starting with deep analysis of what the project requires, sessions on Impact mapping and User Stories. Collaboration and transparency are at the core of our relationships and through the use of online tools we are constantly in touch, real-time on all elements of a project and allows us to deliver on everyone’s expectations.
Our management, design and front end development teams are European based- giving clients great service and local understanding. For large development projects with significant programming requirements, we leverage our long standing and highly experienced offshore team which serves to significantly reduce the cost of the overall project. 
We like to think we offer the best of both worlds- local staff for design, management and front end coupled with great offshore team who we have worked with for years. The Activate structure offers all the advantages of outsourcing without the disadvantages usually associated with it.
Our portfolio range includes: start-ups and small organisations to charities and non-profit organisations, major high street chains and public corporations.
